  \\      /  F ield         | OpenFOAM: The Open Source CFD Toolbox
   \\    /   O peration     | Website:  https://openfoam.org
    \\  /    A nd           | Version:  6
     \\/     M anipulation  |
\*---------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
FoamFile
{
    version     2.0;
    format      ascii;
    class       dictionary;
    object      blockMeshDict;
}
// * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * //

convertToMeters 1;

vertices
(
/* Cookstove body geometry:*/
pt1
pt2
pt3
pt4
pt5
pt6
pt7
pt8
pt9
pt10
pt11
pt12
pt13
pt14
pt15
pt16

/*Fuel Zone:*/
pt17
pt18
pt19
pt20

);

blocks
(
    hex (0 1 2 3 4 5 6 7) (100 40 1) simpleGrading (1 1 1)
);

edges
(
);

boundary
(
    fuel
    {
        type patch;
        faces
        (
            (0 4 7 3)
        );
    }
    air
    {
        type patch;
        faces
        (
            (1 2 6 5)
        );
    }
    outlet
    {
        type patch;
        faces
        (
            (0 1 5 4)
            (7 6 2 3)
        );
    }
    frontAndBack
    {
        type empty;
        faces
        (
            (4 5 6 7)
            (0 3 2 1)
        );
    }
);

mergePatchPairs
(
);
